name: 1ct Princess cut platinum diamond ring
description:
A big congratulations you have found the one!
This is the start of the next part of your exciting lives together!
This beautiful 1ct princes cut diamond ring.\nSet in a hand made platinum ring mount with 0.25ct diamonds down the shoulders.

name: Sparkle Drop Earrings, Pink/Gold
description: Add pretty sparkle to your finished look with the kate spade new york drop earrings from her That Special Sparkle range. Designed with elegant pav√© detailing on the post and a larger dropped crystal, these are a charming pair that brings understated femininity to the fore.

name: Leaf Pearl Necklace, Silver/White
description: Dainty sterling silver sections are crafted into elaborate leaf shape and studded with sparkling cubic zirconia, while natural white pearls add an alternating harmony to the silhouette. The necklace is complete with an adjustable extension chain and a lobster clasp.

name: Multi Stone Chain Bracelet, Aqua Chalcedony/Amethyst
description: Enhance your style with this multi-stone chain bracelet from our own brand's gemstone range.\n\nWith an adjustable chain to suit different wrists, the bracelet charms with its colourful gems, sure to give an elegant boost to smart ensembles.

name: 9ct Rose Gold Morganite and Diamond Oval Cocktail Ring
description:
Made from solid gold, the design combines precious and semi-precious stones in a beautiful and flattering oval structure.

Wear this ring with the coordinating stud earrings for a dazzling evening look.

Morganite weight 0.64ct, diamond weight 0.05ct

name: White Gold Diamond Shoulder Cocktail Ring, Aquamarine
description: Fashioned from polished 18ct white gold, the ring is set with an elegant emerald-cut stone, bracketed by shoulders of glittering diamonds. The main stone is generously proportioned at W8 x H10mm, with an impressive weight of 3ct and securely held in a four-claw setting.\n \nThe white gold band features rows of brilliant-cut diamonds, set securely flush with the band either side of the main gem stone. The diamonds have a combined weight of 0.12ct.

name: 3ct Platinum Diamond Ring
description:
A stunning 3ct diamond ring platinum mount, six claw.

Re-size for free
